Producer: Martha Higareda, Alexis Fridman, Miri Higareda, Miriam Higareda
Synopsis: Adán is a charming seducer who believes he can make any woman swoon. Mia is an ambitious producer who dreams of having her own TV show on female empowerment. As Adán and Mia start to test their seduction strategies on each other, they soon learn that the more you play hard to get, the harder you end up falling.
Title: Tod@s caen
